name: Brawlforming
description:
Hop on and browse through the variety of levels available! Play through them by yourself, or with your friends / other players! Up to 16 can play! If there's no one available, you can join our Discord server to find people to play with.

Since the graphics are rendered with OpenGL, those on weaker systems with an AMD or Intel GPU (latter common in laptops) might get a significant performance boost by switching to Linux over Windows.
